Generation VIII.Sword: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VIII.Shield: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Frosmoth senses air currents with its antennae. It sends its scales drifting on frigid air, making them fall like snow.
Generation IX.Violet: It causes blizzards as it flies around with its huge, chill-emanating wings. Clean meltwater is its favorite thing to drink.

Generation VIII.Sword: Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Path to the Peak Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) Slippery Slope , Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Frigid Sea ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Area One , Glaseado Mountain Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Area One , Glaseado Mountain Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )

method: Level up (during the night, with high friendship)
